Vladimir Chistiukhin

Senior Quality Assurance Engineer

Residence: Spain

Email • LinkedIn

About Me

I’m a Software QA Engineer who’s passionate about making sure every product we release is the best it can be. I’ve worked on improving QA processes across a variety of projects and enjoy collaborating with my team to build reliable, high-quality applications. My experience covers testing backend systems, as well as iOS, Android, and web apps.

I’m an active part of the team from day one, taking part in everything from planning to release.
Along the way, I draw on my language skills — English (C1), Serbo-Croatian (C1), and Spanish (A2) — to communicate and collaborate effectively across diverse teams and projects. My native language is Russian.

Professional Experience

Senior Quality Assurance Engineer at Social Discovery Group

February 2024 – Present
Project: Under NDA (HK)

Achievements:

  • Helped ensure the quality of a product serving over 1.2 million monthly active users
    Took care of the project's quality mitigating risks associated with high user volume and potential costly issues.

  • Worked closely with cross-functional teams, bridging the gap between technical and business stakeholders
    Took my place in the middle of between tech and business teams to help both collaborate the best possible way.

  • Supported quality at every stage of the project by sharing expertise and guiding QA processes
    Shared my experience and knowledge with fellow colleagues to contribute in the quality of the entire project.

  • Coordinated team efforts from grooming to release, suggesting solutions that balanced business goals with team capabilities
    From grooming to release - I was a part of the whole release process. I also made proposals for optimal solutions balancing business requirements and team capabilities based on deep project understanding from both sides.

Senior Quality Assurance Engineer at 4XXI

March 2016 – February 2024
Projects: Advisor Engine (USA), Trivago (EU), Centrallo (USA), Groupdolists (USA), L-Charge (UK)

Achievements:

  • Built QA processes from the ground up
    Properly initiated testing processes helped our clients to reduce the costs of development and product support

  • Researched and implemented the best quality assurance practices.
    These practices on the company level helped us to boost efficiency and raise the quality standards.

  • Created comprehensive testing documentation
    Detailed documentation helped to conduct QA activities in the most efficient way, satisfying customers' expectations.

  • Wrote detailed product documentation
    It helped to build high-quality products, as so project goals and scenarios were well-defined before development began.

  • Suggested UI/UX improvements
    These adjustments were helpful in developing easy-to-understand, user-friendly, and reliable products and services.

  • Coordinated project teams to strengthen collaboration
    I took care of project delivery timelines, and tracked the current status of development down.

  • Mentored fellow QA engineers
    In my career, I’ve made over 40 educational videos explaining different techniques, approaches, and useful tools.
